articles.title: US officials advise Ukraine to wait on offensive, sixth known American killed in Ukraine war - ABC News
articles.description: Senior US officials advise Ukraine to hold off on launching a major offensive against Russian forces until the latest supply of US weaponry is in place and training has been provided.
articles.content: Senior US officials are advising Ukraine to hold off on launching a major offensive against Russian forces until the latest supply of US weaponry is in place and training has been provided, a senior … [+5995 chars]

articles.author: Annika Burgess
articles.title: As the war rages on and military spending booms, the US arms industry is a big winner in Ukraine - ABC News
articles.description: Ukraine continues to need American weapons to hold out against Russia, and now a global military spending boom is set to further benefit the US arms industry. There are accusations of "profiteering", but is there any alternative?
articles.content:
As the war in Ukraine heads towards the one-year mark, so far there has been only one clear winner the US arms industry. 
There is no way Ukraine would have been able to hold out against Russia with… [+9978 chars]

articles.title: First Native American woman in space steps out on spacewalk - The Associated Press
